title: Added Ollama support for Llama 3 and Mistral, Added OpenAI support for vector stores, Added OpenAI Assistants v2 API support, Added Perplexity API support

items: Ollama API support for Llama 3 and Mistral
Cookie support convenience methods added to the HTTP/S clients
OpenAI image generation, editing, and variation
Improved checking for blank command line parameters
